mapper.select: SELECT id, name, condition, category, brand_name, price, shipping, item_description FROM items ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{displaysPerPage} OFFSET #{displaysPerPage}*(#{page}-1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO items (id, name, condition, category, brand_name, price, shipping, item_description) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{condition}, #{category}, #{brandName}, #{price}, #{shipping}, #{itemDescription})
